hero.title: Automated Prospecting with Google Maps
description: An automation built with n8n to capture leads at scale via Google Maps, saving time and effort on repetitive tasks.
It searches for businesses in a specific location, filters relevant results, and organizes the information into a spreadsheet on Google Drive.
Ideal for companies looking to accelerate outbound marketing strategies with qualified data.
hero.note: Currently used internally at the agency

features.title: Key Features
list: Automated business search via Google Maps
Data extraction including name, phone, and address
Filtering leads based on custom criteria
Generation and organization of spreadsheets in Google Drive

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.intro: The automation was born out of the need to scale lead prospecting without relying on manual, time-consuming tasks.
points: Interacting with the Google Maps API to return relevant results.
Automatically filtering data to ensure lead quality.
Avoiding duplicates and structuring reusable data.
mission: Build a plug-and-play solution for internal use and clients.
Dramatically reduce the time needed to generate qualified leads.
Create a scalable, low-cost solution using free or affordable resources.

beforeAfter.before: Manual prospecting with lots of time spent searching.
beforeAfter.after: Complete automation running in the background and updating the leads database.
Structured spreadsheets with applied filters and relevant, ready-to-use data.
